attributes.action: We want first aid to be added to the private school curriculum
attributes.background: We think that first aid should be added to the private school curriculum because it is a very important life skill and at the moment we do not get taught it

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the curriculum in private schools.

You could make this suggestion to the headteacher or the school’s governors.

You might also like sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232061
